item.title: Adding ActionButtons
item.dc:creator: @nathanrr44 nathanrr44
item.description:
@nathanrr44 wrote:

Wellbasically My Server Has A Command which is ::buy. This command then opens a tab where you can purchase certain items with pk points, however i tried to add some items to the list and had some problems.Basically When u click the actionbuttons i added nothing happens you get no items or message saying u have inserficiant points. Here Are the codes

File Name (Player.Java)

player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=ffffff>Range Pure Equips 70 Points", 583, 74); player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=ffffff>Melee Pure Equips 70 Points", 583, 75); player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=ffffff>Super Set 10 Points", 583, 76); player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=ffffff>Statius's warhammer 50 Points", 583, 77); player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=ffffff>Vesta's longsword 50 Points", 583, 78); player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=ffffff>Adamant Gloves 30 Points", 583, 79); player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=ffffff>Rune Gloves 40 Points", 583, 80); player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=ffffff>Barrow Gloves 50 Points", 583, 81); }

FileName (ActionButtonPacketHandler.Java)

(buttonId == 74) { if (player.PkPoints >= 70) { player.getInventory().addItem(1704, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(4212, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(9757, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(9758, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(1129, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(3105, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(664, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(2497, 1); player.PkPoints -= 70; } else { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You Need 70 Shop Points To Buy Range Pure Set"); } } if (buttonId == 75) { if (player.PkPoints >= 70) { player.getInventory().addItem(4151, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(1725, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(5698, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(1305, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(579, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(9809, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(9808, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(577, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(652, 1); player.PkPoints -= 70; } else { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You Need 70 Shop Points To Buy Melee Pure Set"); } } if (buttonId == 76) { if (player.PkPoints >= 10) { player.getInventory().addItem(2440, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(2442, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(2444, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(2434, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(2436, 1); player.PkPoints -= 10; } else { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You Need 10 Shop Points To Buy Super Set"); } } if (buttonId == 77) { if (player.PkPoints >= 50) { player.getInventory().addItem(13902, 1); player.PkPoints -= 50; } else { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You Need 50 Shop Points To Buy Statius's warhammer"); } } if (buttonId == 79) { if (player.PkPoints >= 30) { player.getInventory().addItem(7459, 1); player.PkPoints -= 30; } else { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You Need 30 Shop Points To Buy Addy Gloves"); } } if (buttonId == 80) { if (player.PkPoints >= 40) { player.getInventory().addItem(7460, 1); player.PkPoints -= 40; } else { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You Need 40 Shop Points To Buy Rune Gloves"); } } if (buttonId == 81) { if (player.PkPoints >= 50) { player.getInventory().addItem(7462, 1); player.PkPoints -= 50; } else { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You Need 50 Shop Points To Buy Barrow Gloves"); } } if (buttonId == 78) { if (player.PkPoints >= 50) { player.getInventory().addItem(13899, 1); player.PkPoints -= 50; } else { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You Need 50 Shop Points To Buy Vesta's longsword"); } }
The Parts i added are shows above
Can Anyone look at this and maybe tell me if theres another file i need to change somthing in

Read full topic
